extendedInfo.description: Make "3D" images on your device!*This is a beta version, your device may not be supported at this moment, please send me a fc report / email and tell me your device model and version, I will fix it asap!!!You can take 2 or 3 to 99 photos to make "3D" images, the maximum number of pictures depends on your device.Vibrating Stereo:- Take 2 pictures, and click "Vibrating Stereo" to preview as vibrating stereo.- Vibrate 2 images to produce 3D effect- Slide the screen to change vibration speed.- Export to Animated GIF  Export path : sdcard/PicturesMulti-angle:- Take 3 or more pictures and preview as multi-angle 3D image- Use accelerometer/slide to control the faces of the imageTips to take good 3D pictures:- Always take from left to right.- Don't move your device too far away from your last position.- Try to match the object from the last picture's overlay.- Slide the screen left or right to change last picture overlay's opacity.- Try to put the object in the middle of the screen.- Export to Animated GIF  Export path : sdcard/Pictures*You cannot share the "3D" images directly right now, you may need 3rd parties apps to upload to share space.

reviews.title: Recent update removed features
reviews.comment: Why would you take your app backwards. After the recent update I can no longer export my 3d pics as animated gifs which I  could do before. And I can\'t set the resolution of the pics or change the overlay transparency. It might be an update, but it\'s a downgrade in functionality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant Concept
reviews.comment: Brilliant and ingenious piece of development. What it does now is wonderful, and this is still only beta, so I\'m really looking forward to future progress. Well done!

reviews.title: Absolutely fresh idea!
reviews.comment: Trouble with Motorola RAZR XT-910: Can not initialize camera!!!       I am really exited by this application. The idea of such form of 3D images absolutely new, fresh and easily to view, with comparing with anaglif, mirrors and other methods to view the 3D images. Even more you can view beyond like a holographic image. Very interesting application. I hope soon we have seen more pro version. Have a nice android to all.

reviews.title: Nice Apps, wondering how to put it on web
reviews.comment: Great 3D picture created in just sec! Amazing. I wondering how to put the 3D picture on a web? It would be a great to have it as a product\'s picture for online-store. Especially because buyer wants to see every single side of the product that you sell on your online store.
